did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: World Congress of Sexology meeting ephemera, 2001.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publicity for and DVD of Passion & Power, a 2007 documentary based on Maines' book The Technology of Orgasm; and the program book, schedule, brochures, postcards, pen, briefcase, female condom sample, and other items distributed at the 15th World Congress of Sexology conference, "Back to the Future," held in Paris June 24-28, 2001.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Author of THE TECHNOLOGY OF ORGASM (1999) and conference attendee.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Publicity for and DVD of Passion & Power, a 2007 documentary based on Maines' book The Technology of Orgasm; and the program book, schedule, brochures, postcards, pen, briefcase, female condom sample, and other items distributed at the 15th World Congress of Sexology conference, "Back to the Future," held in Paris June 24-28, 2001.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: World Congress of Sexology meeting ephemera, #7695. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
